body_html:
@drpngx then users can not reuse those build scripts existed in tensorflow, and have to write their own one.

Any first-time user trying to build the tensorflow lib, would very likely meet I met, and feel strange and uncomfortable. User can either just like you said, write another script, then "run the script, collect the artifact, before you start another build?", or like what I did, just add some lines somewhere to copy the libs.

Copying will remove those obtascles.
